messages.subject: Are you looking for a beta-reader? Do you want to offer your talents as one?
messages.msgSnippet:

and can t find one? Are you interested in giving a helping hand, to help improving
messages.messageBody:
Are you messing your hairs because you need a beta to proofread your fic,
and can't find one?

Are you interested in giving a helping hand, to help improving the average
quality of the fics out there?

Then come, join us here: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AFFBetaReaders/

Anime, Original Fiction, Books, Movies, TV shows... Het, yaoi, yuri, and all
the ratings (especially R and NC 17). Every genre and category is
welcomed!!

We'll be waiting for you!

Firuze

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
